name: KiwiCo, Inc.
description: Producer of hands-on activity materials intended to help create problem-solving skills. The company delivers projects encompassing subjects like science, technology, engineering, art, and math, enabling parents to encourage their kid's natural creativity and curiosity and develop creative confidence.
